citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 14:25 on 9/23/2024.
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by arriving at the facility gate and calling the licensee. The
licensee was unavailable for an inspection and unable to return to the facility within the inspection time parameters.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 14:25 on 9/23/2024. 
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by arriving at the facility gate and calling the licensee. The 
licensee was unavailable for an inspection and unable to return to the facility within the inspection time parameters. 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
